original_title: Aitken Spence Printing clinches multiple awards
original_body_lines: From left: DGM – Factory Operations L. Yahampath and AGM – Sales and Marketing Christopher Perera with the Chief Guest Razik Zarook and other officials after receiving awards at Lanka Star 2023
Manager – Press Thushara Jayasinghe receiving an award at the Sri Lanka Print Excellence 2023
Aitken Spence Printing won two Gold, five Silver and one Bronze awards at Lanka Star 2023 awards ceremony which was held recently.
The two Gold, three Silver and one Bronze awards were received for beverage packaging and the other two silver awards for industrial packaging and luxury packaging (one Silver for each category).
The Sri Lanka Packaging Awards’ aim is to recognise excellence and creativity in packaging across various industries.

Submissions for the Sri Lanka Packaging Award 2023 were evaluated on their overall viability, the reason for which they were created, and any unique qualities that would make them deserve of the honour for Sri Lankan packaging. Sri Lanka packaging awards 2023 judging was assessed by eminent panel comprising five on site judges and one external judge including two international judges.
Winners of the Lanka Star awards are eligible to compete at the Asia Star and World Star Competitions.

Aitken Spence Printing won Gold and Bronze awards at the Sri Lanka Print Excellence Awards 2023 that was held recently. The Gold award was received for the category of gift boxes and Bronze Award was received for the category of annual reports.

The event was held after four years to recognise those in the printing & packaging industry for their outstanding achievements. Innovation, creativity and the relentless pursuit of perfection within the printing domain were the focus areas of the awards. This prestigious event serves as a venerable platform for the discerning confluence of luminaries, where the finest craftsmanship and avant-garde technologies converge to honour outstanding achievements in the realm of printing, encapsulating the zenith of artistry and technical prowess in the industry.
An international panel of judges in printing and print related technology evaluated the entries.
